enWisdom: Weeping is the trait of the soft-hearted [and those who fear Allah]

Wisdom: الْبُكَاءُ مِنْ خِيفَةِ اللَّهِ لِلْبُعْدِ عَنِ اللَّهِ عِبَادَةُ الْعَارِفِينَ
enWisdom: Weeping out of fear of Allah, because of being far from Allah, is the worship of the cognizant

Wisdom: الْبُكَاءُ مِنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ يُنِيرُ الْقَلْبَ وَيَعْصِمُ مِنْ مُعَاوَدَةِ الذَّنْبِ
enWisdom: Weeping out of the fear of Allah illuminates the heart and protects [one] from repetition of sin

Wisdom: الْبُكَاءُ مِنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ مِفْتَاحُ الرَّحْمَةِ
enWisdom: Weeping out of the fear of Allah is the key to [divine] mercy

Wisdom: بِالْبُكَاءِ مِنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ تُمَحَّصُ الذُّنُوبُ
enWisdom: By weeping out of the fear of Allah, sins get purified

Wisdom: بُكَاءُ الْعَبْدِ مِنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ يُمَحِّصُ ذُنُوبَهُ
enWisdom: The weeping of a servant out of the fear of Allah clears away his sins
